summary: A reference implementation that trains and evaluates a GraphSAGE model using DGL and MXNet on citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed). It defines the GraphSAGE architecture, loads data, runs training loops, and reports node classification performance.
business_intent: Provide developers and researchers with a ready‑to‑run example for applying inductive graph neural network techniques to large‑scale node classification tasks, facilitating experimentation and adoption of GraphSAGE.
